pages.text: Affect lightning spells. Adds three levels to the effective casting level, reduces spell cooldown by 40%, increases effect amplifiers by 2, and increases spell range by 50%. This modifier is unique to the (l:amethyst_imbuement:focus/getting_started)Spellcasters Focus$(), to obtain it you must ignite your focus to a new tier and select it from one of three options presented, or select Lightning Aspect on a focus that already has that modifier to combine the two into one instance of Fulgurous.

pages.mod_text: Your focus crackles with the very essence of storm clouds. Appears on a Spellcasters Focus on tier ignition or after combining two instances of Lightning Aspect.
